content: I have a great collection with some rarities for sale. All pieces are priced. If you want a specific piece just make a post stating which piece or PM me. If you don't like a price, just make your best offer  I also have PPFF, Cashapp, Venmo if you need other options of payment. I will provide a list and add photos as I get them. All items are in hand and will ship to MJ if needed. ThanksShipping is $10.40 in the 50 states for individual items. I will have to recalculate if overseas. 1g silver 2010 pizza day round 0.004 BTC SOOOOOOOOLD Monero Keychain  0.00055 BTCOnly 3 Coinfest UK chips Are left from the picture for 0.0003 btc ea Vaultbar bitcoin vs Fiat / Etherium vs Fiat  built but not funded comes with more holos 0.0025  BTC  SOOOOOLD 2 silver 1 oz coins left. Both Debt and Death Silver rounds are left Skeleton and D 0.00137 BTC eaAll liberty dollars and the 2014 bitcoin round have been sold. 2015 ETH Brass DIY hologram # 432  0.003 btc 2018 FD brass ETH DIY tokens x2 hologram #434 and #433  0.003 btc eaFinite by design 2015 x2 DIY hologram # 435 and #436 0.003 BTC 2 available 2016 Monero tokens. Silver 0.0041 BTC, Copper brass 0.0029 btc, Copper 0.0029 btc,   4 Doge bullion bars available. The silver 2oz and plated pieces are gone. 4 left. 1 brass lealana 0.1 btc buyer funded  #1305 holo 0.0027 BTC no addressBitcoin Exchange of New Orleans FIVE BITCOINS   0.03 BTCBhCoins 10 bitCents 2013 #300 hologram Funded with public address. No COA, If you can locate it, this coin has $5,200.00 on it.  0.029 BTC1 oz silver NastyFans Batman 0.005 BTC1oz silver Superman Nasty Fans round.   0.005 BTC SOOOOOOLD 2x ETH Finite by Design 2016 #43 DIY and 2015 ETH DIY 0.002 BTC ea4 1 oz silver bitcoin rounds. 1X 10 mBTC and 3x 0.25btc globe Veritas vos Librabit   0.0072 BTC for all Starwars Die Cast Metal Key Chain 1996 0.00055 BTCSaint Petersburg Bitcoin Patch in package 0.0022 BTC2x graded silver eagles. 1 = 2016 W MS70 1 of 2016 and 2014 S San Fransisco First Strike MS69 0.0045 BTC gets bothOnly 2 available Morgan Dollars 1880o 1890 o, Graded as cleaned  $65 each or o.0012 btc ea bitcoin collectable stickers  0.000137 btc ea

I already have several PM from people wanting individual items. Would be a great collection to sit on until a strong bull run.
